p: Akila et al. [ 33] indicated that the total phenolic content of fresh guava leaf was 99.25 mg GAE/g while total flavonoid content was 13.292 mg QE/g and tannin content was 2.962 mg CE/g. Simamora et al. [ 34] investigated the total phenolic and flavonoid content of guava leaves aqueous extract were 114.81 mg GAE/g DW and 152.17 mg RE/g DW, respectively.
